Title: Sophie's Choice (1979)
Notes: Banned in Lebanon for its positive depiction of Jews.

Title: Schindler's Ark (1982)
Notes: Banned in Lebanon for its positive depiction of Jews.

Title: The Da Vinci Code
Notes: Banned in September 2004 in Lebanon after Catholic leaders deemed it offensive to Christianity. (See Inaccuracies in The Da Vinci Code.)
